name: Raggoth
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The raggoth has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The raggoth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17) and restrained.

actions.name: Tormenting Howl (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The raggoth unleashes a piercing howl. All creatures within 60 feet of the raggoth that can hear it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature’s saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the raggoth’s Tormenting Howl for 24 hours.
